rules_text:
[i]Etruia's Great General[/i] – Other Knights and Soldiers you control get +1/+2.
[i]Loyalty to No End[/i] – When Douglas dies, if he doesn't have a -1/-1 counter on him, return him to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter.
[i]His Army Follows[/i] – When Douglas leaves the battlefield, create four 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
